about_the_game: Horror Hotel is a top-down, 2D shooter which pits you against increasingly difficult gauntlets for foes. The demons of Hell have invaded a remote hotel, and you must defeat them using a combination of spells and your trusty Rune Stone. The Rune Stone is your primary weapon, throw it at demons to destroy them. Don’t worry, it comes back… To be victorious, you must take the fight to your enemies by traveling to Hell and destroying the twelve demon generals leading the invasion. You are the Doctor, and it’s time to cleanse this hotel.

content_descriptors.notes: Language, Blood and Gore, Fantasy Violence, Violent References, Alcohol Reference, Tobacco Reference

detailed_description: Horror Hotel is a top-down, 2D shooter which pits you against increasingly difficult gauntlets for foes. The demons of Hell have invaded a remote hotel, and you must defeat them using a combination of spells and your trusty Rune Stone. The Rune Stone is your primary weapon, throw it at demons to destroy them. Don’t worry, it comes back… To be victorious, you must take the fight to your enemies by traveling to Hell and destroying the twelve demon generals leading the invasion. You are the Doctor, and it’s time to cleanse this hotel.
name: Horror Hotel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.21 GHz
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630 and NVIDIA Quadro P5200
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 272 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-8750H CPU @ 2.20GHz 2.21 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630 and NVIDIA Quadro P5200
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 272 MB available space

short_description: Horror Hotel is a top-down, 2D shooter which pits you against increasingly difficult foes. Defeat your demonic enemies with a combination of spells and your Rune Stone. To be victorious you must take the fight to your enemies by traveling to Hell and destroying twelve demon generals in boss battles.
